title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Tony Dungy on Peyton Partnership, Belichick Battles, Rodgers Drama
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Tony Dungy on Peyton Partnership, Belichick Battles, Rodgers Drama
description:
Colin explains the most important thing USC has to look for to find the right head coach (3:00). Then, legendary head coach and NBC Sports analyst Tony Dungy discusses the tough advice he once gave Peyton Manning (10:00), great stories from how the preseason used to be (12:00), why the Jameis Winston/Sean Payton relationship can work (15:00) the adjustment that Bruce Arians made with Tom Brady (16:00), the simple advice he got from Steelers legend Chuck Noll (21:00), why he rolls his eyes at Aaron Rodgers drama in Green Bay (24:00), why he's concerned about the pressures being put on NFL head coaches (26:00), what he loved about coaching against Bill Belichick (28:00), the two keys NFL QBs need to succeed (32:00), Tony's takes on the young NFL QBs and how he would defend them (32:00), the biggest cultural differences between when he was coaching and today (37:00), and why 90% of NFL games are lost rather than won (39:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
